Sentencas: This study describes the bottom-heater-assisted flash light irradiation method for fabrication of lanthanum strontium cobaltite (La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-delta, LSCO) thin films.
Titulo: Heater-assisted intense pulsed light irradiation for lanthanum strontium cobaltite thin film electrode fabrication

Sentencas: Unlike the conventional sintering process, flash light irradiation proceeds instantly under ambient conditions.
Titulo: Heater-assisted intense pulsed light irradiation for lanthanum strontium cobaltite thin film electrode fabrication

Sentencas: Since the flash light irradiation process involves the photothermal effect, heat energy supplied by a bottom heater can compensate for decreased irradiation energy.
Titulo: Heater-assisted intense pulsed light irradiation for lanthanum strontium cobaltite thin film electrode fabrication

Sentencas: The substrate temperature was varied from room temperature to 200 degrees C and 300 degrees C, and the radiation energy requirement for obtaining an optimized LSCO film was decreased with increasing temperature.
Titulo: Heater-assisted intense pulsed light irradiation for lanthanum strontium cobaltite thin film electrode fabrication

Sentencas: In addition, the instantaneous temperature difference due to highly intense energy between the top surface and the substrate can be relieved.
Titulo: Heater-assisted intense pulsed light irradiation for lanthanum strontium cobaltite thin film electrode fabrication

Sentencas: With the innovative sintering system, an electrolyte-supported solid oxide fuel cell could be fabricated by the flash light irradiation method, and electrochemical characterization of the fuel cells was conducted.
Titulo: Heater-assisted intense pulsed light irradiation for lanthanum strontium cobaltite thin film electrode fabrication
